New Records: Rilee Rossouw scored 109, the highest individual score in the match
The second-highest partnership in the tournament (163) between Rossouw and de Kock
Key Match Events: A 163-run stand between Rossouw and de Kock
South Africa's spinners dominating Bangladesh's lower order
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa's strong batting lineup was expected to dominate
Bangladesh's aggressive start was short-lived due to South Africa's effective bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by a 22-minute rain delay during the Powerplay
This was South Africa's highest total in the tournament
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23, Group 2
